ED_Title: Proposed programme of work and timetable of the Special Political and Decolonization Committee (Fourth Committee) for the seventy-third session of the General Assembly
ED_Plenary_Committee: Special Political and Decolonization Committee (Fourth Committee)
ED_OriginatingBody: Special Political and Decolonization Committee (Fourth Committee)
ED_DecisionText:
At its 66th plenary meeting, on 7 December 2017, the General Assembly, on the recommendation of the Special Political and Decolonization Committee (Fourth Committee),  approved the proposed programme of work and timetable of the Special Political and Decolonization Committee (Fourth Committee) for the seventy-third session of the Assembly, as set out in the report of the Committee. 


(See A/72/481, A/72/PV.66)
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/72/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
